tokens.text: controls precipitation visual effects for a biome

fields.title: Red Spores
fields.description: Density of red spore precipitation visuals. Used in the crimson forest biome.

fields.title: Blue Spores
fields.description: Density of blue spore precipitation visuals. Used in the warped forest biome.

fields.title: Ash
fields.description: Density of ash precipitation visuals. Used in the soul sand valley biome.

fields.title: White Ash
fields.description: Density of white ash precipitation visuals. Used in the basalt deltas biome.

generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Client Biome Precipitation
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Describes the visuals for a biome's precipitation. Biomes without this component will have default values. At most one precipitation type can be set for a biome.

fields.title: Blue Spores
fields.description: Density of blue spore precipitation visuals

fields.title: Red Spores
fields.description: Density of blue spore precipitation visuals

fields.title: White Ash
fields.description: Density of white ash precipitation visuals
